name: MPSCNNFullyConnected
desc: A fully connected convolution layer, also known as an inner product layer.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder, device: MTLDevice)
items.desc: Initializes a fully connected convolution layer.

items.name: init(device: MTLDevice, weights: MPSCNNConvolutionDataSource)
items.desc: Initializes a fully connected convolution layer.

items.name: protocol MPSCNNConvolutionDataSource
items.desc: The protocol that provides convolution filter weights and bias terms.

items.name: class MPSCNNConvolutionDescriptor
items.desc: A description of the attributes of a convolution kernel.

items.name: enum MPSCNNConvolutionFlags
items.desc: Options used to control how kernel weights are stored and used in the CNN kernels
